src.util package¶

Submodules¶

src.util.recursive_attributes module¶

util.recursive_attributes.rec_getattr(obj, attr)¶

Get object’s attribute. May use dot notation.

>>> class C(object): pass
>>> a = C()
>>> a.b = C()
>>> a.b.c = 4
>>> rec_getattr(a, 'b.c')
4
util.recursive_attributes.rec_setattr(obj, attr, value)¶

Set object’s attribute. May use dot notation.

>>> class C(object): pass
>>> a = C()
>>> a.b = C()
>>> a.b.c = 4
>>> rec_setattr(a, 'b.c', 2)
>>> a.b.c
2
